definition[0]: to make a loud sound of fear, shock, pain etc
example[0]: John tightened his grip until she cried out.
example[1]: Even the smallest movement made him cry out in pain.
definition[1]: to shout or say something loudly
example[2]: ‘Why are you doing this?’ she cried out suddenly.
example[3]: I felt too terrified to even cry out for help.
example[4]: The kitchen is crying out for a coat of paint.
example[5]: My parents had divorced and I was crying out for love.
